title: Remove any remaining “Instamart” wording and ensure consistent “MyLocal Kart” branding

requirements.text: Audit the entire frontend for any remaining user-facing occurrences of the strings “Instamart” or “InstaMart” (including headings, button labels, helper text, empty states, dialogs, alt text/aria-labels, metadata, and any other displayed copy) and replace them with “MyLocal Kart” so the brand name never appears as Instamart anywhere in the UI.

quotes: All looks good and let there no name of Instamart pop up any where it should show as "MyLocal Kart"

acceptanceCriteria: Navigating the app as guest/customer/vendor/admin shows “MyLocal Kart” consistently and does not display “Instamart”/“InstaMart” anywhere in visible UI text (including dialogs/toasts/empty states).
The HTML document title and any other user-visible metadata rendered in the UI uses “MyLocal Kart” (not “Instamart”/“InstaMart”).
All image alt text and other accessibility labels that are user-facing use “MyLocal Kart” and do not contain “Instamart”/“InstaMart”.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
Use English for any user-facing text.
Do not introduce any new branding names; the only brand name displayed to users must be “MyLocal Kart”.
nonGoals: Renaming internal asset filenames/paths that are not user-facing (e.g., existing image filenames containing legacy terms) unless those filenames are surfaced to users.
Changing the app’s features, flows, or authorization model beyond updating displayed text/labels.
